snippet: Sixteen seconds before a U.P.S. cargo plane crashed on approach to the Birmingham airport, a system in the cockpit warned that the plane was descending too fast.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board says automated system warned pilots of UPS cargo plane that it was descending too fast sixteen seconds before it crashed in the Birmingham, Ala, airport.
lead_paragraph: Sixteen seconds before a U.P.S. cargo plane crashed on approach to the Birmingham airport, a system in the cockpit warned that the plane was descending too fast.

headline.main: Automatic System Warned Pilots Before Alabama Crash
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Automatic System Warned Pilots Before U.P.S. Crash
